subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Outpitched, outhit and outplayed in the first two games, the Mets decided to do things a little differently. But none of that was good enough to overcome the magic that is transpiring at Fenway Park.
snippet: Outpitched, outhit and outplayed in the first two games, the Mets decided to do things a little differently. But none of that was good enough to overcome the magic that is transpiring at Fenway Park.
